Title: NFE’s Altamira FLNG receives authorisation to export LNG to non-FTA countries
Description: New Fortress Energy, or NFE, has received a five-year authorisation from the US Department of Energy to export up to 1.4 mtpa of LNG from Altamira Fast LNG to countries with which the US does not have a Free Trade Agreement.
Author: JS

Title: Pioneer and New Energy LNG tankers seen performing STS transfer near Port Said
Description: The sanctioned 138,000 m3 Pioneer LNG tanker which discreetly loaded the 19.8 mtpa Arctic LNG 2’s first cargo last month is still seen performing a ship-to-ship LNG transfer off the coast of Egypt in the Mediterranean Sea.
Author: JS

Title: Deutsche Regas’ energy terminal in Mukran commences regular operations
Description: The Deutsche Regas-operated Deutsche Ostsee energy terminal in Germany’s port of Mukran in the Baltic Sea has begun regular operations, following the concurrent delivery of an LNG cargo to the terminal’s two interconnected floating storage regasification units last week.
Author: CK

Title: British Sponsor looks poised to deliver LNG cooldown cargo for Greater Tortue Ahmeyim FLNG
Description: The BP-operated 173,400 m3 British Sponsor LNG tanker idling off the coast of Senegal and Mauritania appears poised to deliver an LNG cooldown cargo to the yet-to-start BP-operated 2.4 mtpa Greater Tortue Ahmeyim floating LNG facility.
Author: CK
